data.title: Archbishop Nikitas at the Coronation of King Charles III (VIDEO)
data.meta_description: With deep emotion, gratitude, and appreciation for the honorary invitation of His Majesty, King Charles III, His Eminence Archbishop Nikitas of Thyateira and Great Britain, attended and participated in the Coronation Ceremony of the new King on Saturday, May 6, 2023. During the Ceremony, His Eminence offered a prayer to…
